comments.author: C(h)ristine
comments.content: that ritz cracker with kraft cheese and jam--that brings back memories!  before i knew of quince and manchego as a child, i always ate exactly what you have above as my personal snack.

comments.author: Manggy
comments.content: Those look great, Michael-- even the Kraft singles. Of course, I'm not a very picky eater or anything. For me, Welch's on Morbier is perfectly acceptable, which is probably why I'm not a chef :)

comments.author: Derick
comments.content:
Very nice! I like the grape cubes.

I've always been a great fan of cheese and grapes, just simple and plain - no prep work required. They contract each other perfectly imo..
